transArray.content: Every time I travel, I stay here all year round. It is always clean and hygienic, the decoration style is simple, and the service is very good no matter which store it is. The guys and girls at the front desk are very enthusiastic. It is the first choice for travel, and the price is also very reasonable, no matter which store it is. There won't be much difference in that area. I always thought Beijing would be more expensive, but it's not. Prices are similar across the country.
Your simple compliments are better than those soft words of love. For this reason, we will stride forward and do our best! We look forward to your visit again!
